data.actual_result: Some portion of the window gets cut off as shown below.
data.expected_result: You can see their window in the screen-share fully.
data.short_description: Screensharing gets cut off in landscape mode. [iPad Only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Call someone. - Have them to share their screen. - Make sure your iPad isn’t rotation-locked. - Rotate your iPad to the landscape mode.
